sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container class="mainWidth">
    <v-row>
      <v-col cols="6">
        <Bar v-
          id="my-chart-id"
          :options="chartOptions"
          :data="allSalesPerformance"
        />
      </v-col>
      <v-col cols="6">
        <Bar
          id="my-chart-id"
          :options="chartOptions"
          :data="chartData"
        />
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
    <v-row>
      <v-col cols="12">
      <TableRevGP />
    </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import { mapActions, mapState } from 'vuex';
import TableRevGP from '@/components/Tables/TableRevGP.vue';
import { Bar } from 'vue-chartjs'
import { Chart as ChartJS, Title, Tooltip, Legend, BarElement, CategoryScale, LinearScale } from 'chart.js'

ChartJS.register(Title, Tooltip, Legend, BarElement, CategoryScale, LinearScale)

  export default {

    components: {
      TableRevGP,
      Bar
    },

    data() {
      return {
        chartData: {
        labels: [ 'January', 'February', 'March' ],
        datasets: [ { data: [40, 20, 12] } ]
      },
      chartOptions: {
        responsive: true
      },
      loaded: false
      }
    },

    computed: {
      ...mapState('custom', ['allSalesPerformance'])
    },

    methods: {
      ...mapActions('custom', ['getAllSalesPerformanceAction']),
    },

    mounted() {     
      this.getAllSalesPerformanceAction('SFR')
    },

  }
</script>

<style scoped>
  .mainWidth {
    max-width: calc(100vw * 0.9);
  }
</style>
